Module schach
Package schach.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.model.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board representing the chess board

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<Piece> cemetery
      List of pieces that are beaten, no longer available on the board
      private Check check
      Check class to check for check-situation on the board
      private Piece lastMoved
      Piece that was moved in the last move
      private int moveCount
      Indicates the number of moves already made
      private BoardState redoState
      The current state in before a earlier state will be loaded, used to redo the undo
      private Square[][] squareMatrix
      Matrix of Squares representing the chess board
      private java.util.List<BoardState> states
      List that contains all the states the board was in

      • addPiece

        public void addPiece​(java.lang.String piece,
                     java.lang.String squareDenotation,
                     boolean isWhite)
        Adds a wanted piece to a given position to the board
        Parameters:
        piece - the piece entered in lowercase
        squareDenotation - the denotation of the position square the piece should be placed on
        isWhite - true if added piece should be white, flase if black

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        prints the current setup of the board

      • squareByDenotation

        public Square squareByDenotation​(java.lang.String denotation)
        converts input string denotation to the belonging Square-Object
        Parameters:
        denotation - denotes a square on the chess board
        Returns:
        the square indicated by the denotation

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare​(int column,
                        int row)
        getter for a Square of the SquareMatrix
        Parameters:
        column - the integer value of the column of the wanted square
        row - the integer value of the row of the wanted square
        Returns:
        Square that is represented by the given coordinates

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece​(java.lang.String startingPos,
                      java.lang.String targetPos)
        Moving a piece from a certain square to a certain square
        Parameters:
        startingPos - denotation of the square which the piece to be moved is occupying
        targetPos - denotation of the square which the piece is supposed to be moved to

      • allActivePieces

        public java.util.List<Piece> allActivePieces​(boolean isWhite)
        Returns all pieces currently active on the board of a given color
        Parameters:
        isWhite - true for all white pieces, false for all black pieces
        Returns:
        List of all active pieces of a color

      • updateAllLegalSquares

        public void updateAllLegalSquares()
        Updates the list of legal squares of every active piece

      • attackedSquares

        public java.util.List<Square> attackedSquares​(boolean attackerIsWhite)
        Lists all squares that are currently under attack by a color
        Parameters:
        attackerIsWhite - true for all squares attacked by white, false for attacked by black
        Returns:
        ArrayList of attacked squares

      • isUnderAttack

        public boolean isUnderAttack​(java.lang.String denotation,
                             boolean oppositeIsWhite)
        checks if a given square is under attack by a given color
        Parameters:
        denotation - denotation of square which should be checked
        oppositeIsWhite - true if opposite color is white, false if black
        Returns:
        true if square is under attack, false if not

        public void loadState​(int index)

        Parameters:
        index - of the State in the list (0 is the initial (starting lineup) state)
